SELECT_CHILD_ON_CLICK_BUNDLE_KEY - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.selectable.AbstractSelectableExpandableListAdapter
The key, which is used to store, whether a child item should be selected, when it is clicked by the user, or not, within a bundle.
SELECT_GROUP_ON_CLICK_BUNDLE_KEY - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.selectable.AbstractSelectableExpandableListAdapter
The key, which is used to store, whether a group item should be selected, when it is clicked by the user, or not, within a bundle.
SELECT_ITEM_ON_CLICK_BUNDLE_KEY - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.adapter.list.selectable.AbstractSelectableListAdapter
The key, which is used to store, whether an item should be selected, when it is clicked by the user, or not, within a bundle.
SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> - Interface in de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.selectable
Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items of which one or multiple items can be selected, must implement.
SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> - Class in de.mrapp.android.adapter
An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of an SelectableExpandableListAdapter.

SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> - Interface in de.mrapp.android.adapter
Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one single item can be selected at once, must implement.
SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapterImplementation<GroupType,ChildType> - Class in de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.selectable
An adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one item can be selected at once.

An exception, which is thrown, if the items of an adapter should be sorted, but the underlying data does not implement the interface Comparable.
